0.author: Tamara_Robin
0.content:
Hello,
Is there any example of processing an image using the quantum equivalent of the classical PCA?
Thanks

1.author: isaacdevlugt
1.content:
Hey @Tamara_Robin! Welcome to the forum 
We don’t have a demo on this specifically, but there are a couple demos that use PCA in some way shape or form:

Ensemble classification with Rigetti and Qiskit devices 2
Quantum advantage in learning from experiments 2

Just doing some googling, though, there seems to be a sufficient amount of literature on quantum PCA to make some code!
(You could also try using ChatGPT … no idea how well it would work!)
